issue.title: goldapk.app
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.9.23

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://wa2.goldapk.app/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

||avads.live^ (look in script it talks about ads)

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

pull_request.title: Fix #199784 searchengines.guru
pull_request.body:
Issue: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/199784

Looks like the rule is not needed any more?

Related issue: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/107236

issue.title: dopebox.to
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://dopebox.to](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fdopebox.to) ### Comment > When I got AdGuard it was not working (made website not load) so I turned it off and uninstalled but I still could not load the website.
